title: PIA CEO calls on DPM/FM Dar
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 28 (APP): Chief Executive Officer Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) AVM Amir Hayat Saturday called on Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar.
The CEO acknowledged that during the PDM government (2022–2023) necessary groundwork was laid, enabling PIA & CAA to meet ICAO requirements, leading to the resumption of PIA flights to EU in November 2024, DPM Office said in a press release.
Appreciating the DPM/FM’s continued support, he requested further diplomatic assistance for resumption of flights to the UK.
The DPM/FM informed that he and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs were actively engaged with the UK authorities to ensure the lifting of the ban at the earliest.
